alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 4:02AM CDT until June 22 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL BURLEIGH AND EAST CENTRAL OLIVER COUNTIES... At 401 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wilton to 11 miles southwest of Regan to 8 miles northwest of Menoken, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Regan around 420 AM CDT. Wing around 430 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Price, Arena and Baldwin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
